H0.text: Bolts are the best fasteners for fastening the sides of a wooden birdhouse.

H1.text: Hooks are the best fasteners to use to fasten the sides of a wooden birdhouse.

H2.text: Nails are the best fasteners to use for fastening the sides of a wooden birdhouse.

H3.text: Pins are the best fasteners to use to fasten the sides of a wooden birdhouse.

A4.text: Wood screw is a metal screw used to fix wood, with a sharp point and a tapered thread designed to cut its own thread into the wood.

A5.text: Wood screws are typically coated with zinc galvanization or black oxide to prevent corrosion.

A6.text: For critical high-tensile-strength applications, low-grade bolts may fail, resulting in damage or injury.
